title: Broccoli with Oil and Lemon
introduction: Broccoli with Oil and Lemon is a classic way of serving green vegetables in southern Italy. The key to this dish is its simplicity, allowing the natural flavors of the broccoli to shine through while being enhanced by extra-virgin olive oil and fresh lemon juice. It is always served at room temperature, making it an easy and refreshing side dish for any meal.
instructions: 1. Cut the broccoli into large florets. Trim off the ends of the stems. Peel off the tough skin with a swivel-blade vegetable peeler. Cut thick stems crosswise into 1/4-inch slices.
2. Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add the broccoli and salt to taste. Cook until the broccoli is tender, 5 to 7 minutes. Drain and cool slightly under cold running water.
3. Drizzle the broccoli with the oil and lemon juice. Garnish with the lemon wedges. Serve at room temperature.
